text:
Hey <!channel>. It's the weekend!

Dexter told me this was too macabre for a Friday night, but it's amazing so I'm sharing it anyway...:innocent:

Here's a little Friday Find for you>>>

I came across a Chrome Extension called *"The Death Clock"* :eyes: ... Every time you open a new tab, it displays the number of days, hours, and minutes left in your life, roughly calculated based on average lifespans. The line “Make them count!” appears underneath.

Link here: <https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/death-clock/nddjbfjdamhcmdcghehomomgppbigjam?utm_source=gmail>

Hope you have a fab weekend all. MAKE IT COUNT!! haha :muscle:

attachments.title: Death Clock
attachments.text: Gentle reminder about how fleeting life is. Time to make the most of it!

text: Amazing. Now I just need an extension that quotes Camus on the absurdity of life and my browsing experience will be complete!
